amendment.description: Amendment, as modified pursuant to the rule, limits the maximum award of noneconomic damages in health care liability actions to $250,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to cap awards for noneconomic damages (such as "pain and suffering" or "emotional distress") at $250,000 for all civil cases. It does not preempt or supersede any law that further limits such awards.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cox amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 247 - 171 (Roll no. 226).
